mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM log_log AS ll LEFT JOIN eqi_equipment AS eqi ON ll.equipment_int = eqi.equipment_int LEFT JOIN eqi_device AS dev ON ll.device_id = dev.device_id LEFT JOIN cap_user AS cur ON ll.creator = cur.USER_ID
ll.log_type = '105'
and eqi.equipment_id like '%${equipmentId}%'
and eqi.equipment_name like '%${equipmentName}%'
and dev.device_name like '%${deviceName}%'
and ll.plc_group_name like '%${plcGroupName}%'
and ll.group_type like '%${groupType}%'
and ll.tag_name like '%${tagName}%'
and cur.USER_NAME like '%${createName}%'
and ll.create_time like '%${createTime}%'

SELECT eqi.equipment_id, eqi.equipment_name, dev.app_id, dev.device_name, ll.plc_group_name, ll.group_type, ll.map_address, ll.tag_name, cur.USER_NAME AS createName, ll.create_time FROM log_log AS ll LEFT JOIN eqi_equipment AS eqi ON ll.equipment_int = eqi.equipment_int LEFT JOIN eqi_device AS dev ON ll.device_id = dev.device_id LEFT JOIN cap_user AS cur ON ll.creator = cur.USER_ID
ll.log_type = '105'
and eqi.equipment_id like '%${equipmentId}%'
and eqi.equipment_name like '%${equipmentName}%'
and dev.device_name like '%${deviceName}%'
and ll.plc_group_name like '%${plcGroupName}%'
and ll.group_type like '%${groupType}%'
and ll.tag_name like '%${tagName}%'
and cur.USER_NAME like '%${createName}%'
and ll.create_time like '%${createTime}%'
order by ${field} ${order}
limit ${begin},${limit}
